title: Chay display typeface
content:
Hello folks,

Another one that I can’t ID myself.  
 [http://www.francoischay.eu/](http://web.archive.org/web/20091108153303/http:/www.francoischay.eu/ "http://www.francoischay.eu/")

Talking about the large red display face — i.e. “Crème de l’eau”.

Thanks in advance, you guys are great.
